description: Antibiotics are medications that fight bacterial infections.
function: Kill or inhibit the growth of bacteria on the skin

description: Azelaic acid is a naturally occurring acid found in grains like barley, wheat, and rye.
function: Exfoliates the skin
Unclogs pores
Reduces inflammation

description: Benzoyl peroxide is a topical medication used to treat acne.
function: Releases oxygen, which kills bacteria on the skin's surface

description: Ceramides are lipid molecules that help form the skin's barrier and retain moisture.
function: Repairs and maintains the skin's barrier function

description: Corticosteroid injections are medications injected into the skin to reduce inflammation.
function: Suppress the immune response and reduce inflammation

description: Glycerin is a humectant that attracts moisture to the skin.
function: Draws water from the environment into the skin and helps maintain moisture balance

description: Glycolic acid is an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) derived from sugar cane.
function: Penetrates the skin to dissolve dead skin cells and unclog pores

description: Hyaluronic acid is a naturally occurring substance found in the skin that attracts and retains moisture.
benefits: Plumps and smooths fine lines and wrinkles
function: Attracts and holds water in the skin's dermis

description: Isotretinoin is a medication used to treat severe acne.
function: Targets the underlying causes of acne

description: Lactic acid is an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) derived from milk.
function: Promotes cell turnover and stimulates collagen production

description: Niacinamide, also known as vitamin B3, is a water-soluble vitamin.
function: Boosts collagen production and repairs damaged skin

description: Non-comedogenic moisturizers are formulated to not clog pores.
function: Provides hydration without blocking pores

description: Oral antibiotics are medications taken by mouth to treat bacterial infections.
function: Kill or inhibit the growth of bacteria in the body

description: Retinoids are derivatives of vitamin A.
function: Promotes skin renewal and prevents acne formation

description: Salicylic acid is a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) derived from willow bark.
function: Penetrates into pores to dissolve oil and dead skin cells

description: Sulfur is a naturally occurring mineral with antibacterial properties.
function: Absorbs excess oil and unclogs pores

description: Tea tree oil is an essential oil derived from the leaves of the tea tree plant.
function: Kills acne-causing bacteria and reduces redness

description: Topical clindamycin is an antibiotic medication applied to the skin to treat acne.
function: Inhibits bacterial growth and reduces inflammation

description: Topical retinoids are vitamin A derivatives applied to the skin to treat acne.
function: Promotes skin renewal and prevents acne formation

description: Lightweight sunscreens are sunscreen formulations that feel lightweight on the skin.
function: Blocks harmful UV rays from penetrating the skin

description: Zinc is a mineral that plays a vital role in skin health and function.
function: Acts as an antioxidant and anti-inflammatory agent
